title: How long do you use a computer each day and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: It definitely depends on what I have going on. This summer, I haven’t really done anything so I spend a decent amount of time using my laptop. Whenever I’m working it kind of throws me off and there are days where I won’t use my laptop at all. I also kind of have friends and that throws me off from computering (yes, computering). Oh, and school! Whenever I’m using it, it’s typically for binge-watching (which could take up a little less than half a day when I include looking up definitions, reading articles about the show, etc), editing my blog and/or writing poetry, reading articles outside of binge-watching, and I’ve now become accustomed to using Quora on a daily basis, whether it be on my laptop or my phone. I should get some sunshine.

At my job, I work ~8 hours a day. I’d say about 6 on average. Really the only time I don’t use it is when I’m in meetings; even some meetings I need it. The reason why is I need to for my job in IT. While I’ll still read textbooks on my own time, it’s not very common at work for learning.
